inclusion.criterion: Histological confirmation of either glioblastoma, IDH wildtype (GBM), anaplastic astrocytoma, IDH wildtype (AA) or non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: EGFR Status: GBM/AA must have EGFR amplification and/or EGFRvIII mutation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Glioblastoma, IDH wildtype/Anaplastic astrocytoma, IDH wildtype (GBM/AA) Cohort: Diagnosis: Histological confirmation of either glioblastoma, IDH wildtype (GBM) or anaplastic astrocytoma, IDH wildtype (AA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Previous treatments: Patients must have been previously treated with radiation and temozolomide
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Radiographic progression: Patients with GBM/AA must have radiographic progression based on RANO criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) 0 or 1. For patients with NSCLC with leptomeningeal metastases, ECOG 2 is also acceptable
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Persons of childbearing potential who are unwilling to employ adequate contraception
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 45-year-old man with a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain.
